thread.title: Food Truck Friday rolls into Mount Holly Oct. 23
thread.title_full: Food Truck Friday rolls into Mount Holly Oct. 23

author: Staff Reports
title: Food Truck Friday rolls into Mount Holly Oct. 23
text:
Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 11:16 AM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 11:16 AM The event features live music, children activities and Pumpkin Patch. Bring lawn chairs and blankets. » Read more MORE THAN JUST FOOD 
The event features live music, children activities and Pumpkin Patch. Bring lawn chairs and blankets. Food Truck Friday rolls back into downtown Mount Holly from 5 to 8 p.m. Oct. 23. The event takes place along Main Street in front of the old City Hall, 131 S. Main St. That block will be closed to traffic. Food trucks lined up to participate so far include Becheler's Shave Ice; Gyro Twins; Hot Box Nest Level Street; New Wrap Order; OooWee BBQ; Taco Green-Go; and Wendy's Weiner's. A large crowd turned out for September’s Food Truck Friday. By Staff Reports
